messages.content: Generate a data center cooling monitoring screen with DCIM theme. Show 10 CRAH units with supply/return temps, fan speeds, and valve positions. Include room temperature map and PUE. Resolution 1920x1080.

{"screen":{"type":"data_center_cooling","resolution":{"width":1920,"height":1080},"theme":"dcim","layout":"room_layout"},"sections":[{"id":"dc_header","type":"title_bar","title":"Data Center Cooling - Server Room A","pue":1.45,"total_cooling":650,"cooling_unit":"kW"},{"id":"temperature_map","type":"thermal_map","hot_aisle":[75,78,76,74],"cold_aisle":[65,64,63,65],"unit":"°F"},{"id":"crah_units","type":"crah_grid","units":10,"unit_names":["CRAH-01","CRAH-02","CRAH-03","CRAH-04","CRAH-05","CRAH-06","CRAH-07","CRAH-08","CRAH-09","CRAH-10"],"supply_temps":[55,54,56,55,53,55,56,54,55,57],"return_temps":[75,74,76,75,73,75,76,74,75,77],"temp_unit":"°F","fan_speeds":[65,72,58,62,80,68,55,70,63,45],"speed_unit":"%","valve_positions":[45,52,38,42,60,48,35,50,43,25]},{"id":"chilled_water","type":"chw_panel","supply_temp":45,"return_temp":55,"temp_unit":"°F","flow_rate":850,"flow_unit":"GPM","delta_t":10},{"id":"efficiency_metrics","type":"efficiency_display","metrics":[{"name":"PUE","value":1.45},{"name":"CLF","value":0.35},{"name":"PLF","value":0.85},{"name":"RTI","value":92}]}]}
Create a building access control screen with security theme. Show 20 doors with status, 4 card readers, and elevator access floors. Include alarm zones and visitor count. Resolution 1680x1050.

{"screen":{"type":"access_control","resolution":{"width":1680,"height":1050},"theme":"security","layout":"floor_plan"},"sections":[{"id":"security_header","type":"header","title":"Building Access Control - Main Campus","occupants":1250,"visitors":45},{"id":"door_status","type":"door_grid","doors":20,"door_names":["Main Entrance","Lobby A","Lobby B","Stair 1","Stair 2","Elevator Lobby","Office Wing","Lab Access","Server Room","Mechanical","Electrical","Warehouse","Loading Dock","Cafeteria","Gym","Conference A","Conference B","Executive Suite","HR Office","IT Office"],"door_statuses":["closed","closed","closed","closed","closed","closed","closed","secured","secured","closed","closed","closed","open","closed","closed","closed","closed","secured","closed","secured"]},{"id":"card_readers","type":"reader_panel","readers":[{"location":"Main Lobby","last_access":"John Doe, 08:45"},{"location":"Elevator Bank","last_access":"Jane Smith, 08:52"},{"location":"Lab Entry","last_access":"Dr. Wilson, 08:30"},{"location":"Parking Garage","last_access":"Visitor #12, 08:15"}]},{"id":"elevator_control","type":"elevator_access","elevators":4,"restricted_floors":["5","6","7","8"],"public_floors":["1","2","3","4"]},{"id":"alarm_zones","type":"zone_monitor","zones":[{"name":"Perimeter","status":"secure"},{"name":"Server Room","status":"secure"},{"name":"Loading Dock","status":"active"},{"name":"Roof Access","status":"secure"}]}]}

Generate a fire alarm system screen with life safety theme. Show 3 panels with device counts, 150 detectors, 50 pull stations, and alarm zones. Include system status and event log. Resolution 1366x768.

{"screen":{"type":"fire_alarm","resolution":{"width":1366,"height":768},"theme":"life_safety","layout":"panel_view"},"sections":[{"id":"fire_header","type":"header","title":"Fire Alarm System - Building 42","system_status":"normal","last_test":"2024-01-15"},{"id":"control_panels","type":"panel_status","panels":3,"panel_names":["Main Panel - Lobby","Remote 1 - East Wing","Remote 2 - West Wing"],"panel_status":["normal","normal","normal"],"device_counts":[85,42,73],"device_total":200},{"id":"device_summary","type":"device_counts","detectors":150,"pull_stations":50,"modules":25,"horns":60,"strobes":60,"total":345},{"id":"alarm_zones","type":"zone_status","zones":12,"zone_names":["Zone 1 Lobby","Zone 2 Offices","Zone 3 Lab","Zone 4 Warehouse","Zone 5 Mech","Zone 6 Storage"],"zone_statuses":["normal","normal","normal","normal","normal","normal"]},{"id":"event_log","type":"log_display","events":[{"time":"08:15","event":"System Test - All Normal"},{"time":"07:30","event":"Detector Cleaning - Zone 3"},{"time":"06:45","event":"System Power Normal"}],"max_events":20},{"id":"trouble_summary","type":"trouble_panel","troubles":0,"supervisory":0,"alarms":0}]}

Create a solar farm monitoring screen with renewable energy theme. Show 5000 panels in array view, 50 inverters, grid connection status, and cumulative generation. Include weather data and efficiency. Resolution 1920x1080.

{"screen":{"type":"solar_farm","resolution":{"width":1920,"height":1080},"theme":"renewable","layout":"array_diagram"},"sections":[{"id":"plant_header","type":"title_bar","title":"Solar Farm - Array 3","total_power":1250,"power_unit":"kW","capacity":1500},{"id":"array_overview","type":"panel_array","total_panels":5000,"active_panels":4985,"string_voltage":850,"string_current":1250,"irradiance":825,"irradiance_unit":"W/m²"},{"id":"inverter_status","type":"inverter_grid","inverters":50,"inverter_names":["INV-01 through INV-50"],"inverter_status":"operational","failed_inverters":1,"efficiency":97.5,"efficiency_unit":"%"},{"id":"grid_connection","type":"grid_panel","grid_status":"connected","export_power":1150,"export_unit":"kW","grid_frequency":60.0,"frequency_unit":"Hz","power_factor":0.98},{"id":"generation_metrics","type":"energy_panel","today_generation":8750,"today_unit":"kWh","month_generation":245000,"year_generation":2850000,"co2_saved":1425,"co2_unit":"tons"},{"id":"weather_station","type":"weather_panel","temperature":28,"temp_unit":"°C","wind_speed":12,"wind_unit":"km/h","cloud_cover":15,"cloud_unit":"%"}]}

Design a wastewater treatment plant overview with environmental theme. Show primary treatment, secondary treatment, and tertiary stages. Include flow rates and quality parameters at each stage. Resolution 1600x900.

{"screen":{"type":"wwtp_overview","resolution":{"width":1600,"height":900},"theme":"environmental","layout":"process_flow"},"sections":[{"id":"plant_header","type":"header","title":"Wastewater Treatment Plant - Overview","plant_flow":12.5,"flow_unit":"MGD"},{"id":"primary_treatment","type":"treatment_stage","stage_name":"Primary Treatment","influent_bod":220,"effluent_bod":140,"bod_unit":"mg/L","influent_tss":250,"effluent_tss":125,"tss_unit":"mg/L","flow":12.5,"removal_efficiency":45},{"id":"secondary_treatment","type":"treatment_stage","stage_name":"Secondary Treatment","influent_bod":140,"effluent_bod":15,"bod_unit":"mg/L","influent_tss":125,"effluent_tss":20,"tss_unit":"mg/L","do_level":2.5,"do_unit":"mg/L","flow":12.5,"removal_efficiency":89},{"id":"tertiary_treatment","type":"treatment_stage","stage_name":"Tertiary Treatment","influent_bod":15,"effluent_bod":5,"bod_unit":"mg/L","influent_tss":20,"effluent_tss":5,"tss_unit":"mg/L","phosphorus":0.5,"phosphorus_unit":"mg/L","flow":12.5,"removal_efficiency":67},{"id":"discharge_quality","type":"quality_panel","parameters":[{"name":"Final BOD","value":5,"limit":10},{"name":"Final TSS","value":5,"limit":10},{"name":"Ammonia","value":1.2,"limit":3},{"name":"Total Phosphorus","value":0.5,"limit":1}]}]}
Generate a pharmaceutical water system screen with GMP theme. Show WFI generation, storage, and distribution loops. Include conductivity, TOC, and temperature. Resolution 1920x1080.

{"screen":{"type":"pharma_water","resolution":{"width":1920,"height":1080},"theme":"gmp","layout":"loop_diagram"},"sections":[{"id":"water_header","type":"title_bar","title":"WFI System - Purified Water Distribution","system_status":"operational"},{"id":"generation","type":"generation_unit","unit_name":"WFI Still - Multi-Effect","production_rate":450,"rate_unit":"L/hr","feed_temp":85,"temp_unit":"°C","steam_pressure":45,"pressure_unit":"psi"},{"id":"storage_tank","type":"tank_monitor","tank_name":"WFI Storage Tank T-101","level":72,"level_unit":"%","volume":1800,"volume_unit":"L","temperature":85,"temp_unit":"°C","blanket_pressure":12,"pressure_unit":"psi"},{"id":"distribution_loops","type":"loop_panel","loops":3,"loop_names":["Loop A - Manufacturing","Loop B - Lab","Loop C - CIP"],"loop_status":["recirculating","recirculating","recirculating"],"return_temp":[84,83,85],"temp_unit":"°C","flow_rate":[180,65,95],"flow_unit":"L/min","conductivity":[0.8,0.7,0.9],"conductivity_unit":"µS/cm"},{"id":"quality_monitoring","type":"quality_display","parameters":[{"name":"Conductivity","value":0.8,"limit":1.3},{"name":"TOC","value":125,"unit":"ppb","limit":500},{"name":"Bacteria","value":0,"unit":"CFU/100mL","limit":10},{"name":"Endotoxins","value":0.05,"unit":"EU/mL","limit":0.25}]}]}

Create a cement plant kiln control screen with heavy industry theme. Show kiln feed, fuel rate, burning zone temperature, and cooler status. Include emissions monitoring and production rate. Resolution 1680x1050.

{"screen":{"type":"cement_kiln","resolution":{"width":1680,"height":1050},"theme":"heavy_industry","layout":"kiln_diagram"},"sections":[{"id":"kiln_header","type":"header","title":"Kiln Line 2 - Pyroprocessing","production_rate":125,"production_unit":"TPH"},{"id":"kiln_parameters","type":"parameter_grid","parameters":[{"name":"Kiln Feed","value":125,"unit":"TPH"},{"name":"Fuel Rate","value":18.5,"unit":"TPH"},{"name":"Burning Zone Temp","value":1450,"unit":"°C"},{"name":"Kiln Speed","value":3.2,"unit":"RPM"},{"name":"Kiln Torque","value":65,"unit":"%"},{"name":"Secondary Air Temp","value":950,"unit":"°C"}]},{"id":"cooler_status","type":"cooler_panel","cooler_type":"Grate Cooler","grate_speed":8.5,"speed_unit":"strokes/min","cooler_pressure":1.8,"pressure_unit":"kPa","clinker_temp":85,"temp_unit":"°C"},{"id":"emissions","type":"emissions_monitor","noX":380,"noX_unit":"mg/Nm³","so2":45,"so2_unit":"mg/Nm³","particulates":12,"particulates_unit":"mg/Nm³","opacity":3.5,"opacity_unit":"%"}]}

Design a steel mill electric arc furnace screen with metals theme. Show power input, electrode position, temperature, and tap weight. Include scrap charge status and offgas analysis. Resolution 1920x1080.

{"screen":{"type":"eaf_control","resolution":{"width":1920,"height":1080},"theme":"metals","layout":"furnace_view"},"sections":[{"id":"furnace_header","type":"title_bar","title":"Electric Arc Furnace - Melt Shop","heat_number":"H-2415","grade":"Low Carbon"},{"id":"power_control","type":"power_panel","power_input":65,"power_unit":"MW","voltage":850,"voltage_unit":"V","current":75,"current_unit":"kA","power_factor":0.82,"tap":5,"impedance":4.5,"impedance_unit":"mΩ"},{"id":"electrodes","type":"electrode_control","electrodes":3,"positions":[125,118,132],"position_unit":"cm","regulation_mode":"auto","consumption":2.8,"consumption_unit":"kg/ton"},{"id":"process_parameters","type":"parameter_display","steel_temp":1650,"temp_unit":"°C","tap_weight":125,"weight_unit":"tons","oxygen_blow":850,"blow_unit":"Nm³/hr","carbon_injection":12,"injection_unit":"kg/min"},{"id":"scrap_charge","type":"charge_status","buckets":2,"current_bucket":2,"scrap_weight":62,"weight_unit":"tons","remaining":0},{"id":"offgas_analysis","type":"gas_analysis","co":18.5,"co2":12.2,"h2":5.8,"unit":"%"}]}
Create compressor control screen. Dark theme. Start and Stop buttons. 6 indicators. Resolution 1280x720.

{"screen":{"type":"machine_control","resolution":{"width":1280,"height":720},"theme":"industrial_dark","layout":"header_body_footer"},"sections":[{"id":"buttons","type":"button_group","alignment":"horizontal","buttons":[{"label":"Start","style":"primary"},{"label":"Stop","style":"danger"}]},{"id":"indicators","type":"indicator_grid","rows":2,"columns":3}]}
Add Reset button and alarm banner at bottom.

{"screen":{"type":"machine_control","resolution":{"width":1280,"height":720},"theme":"industrial_dark","layout":"header_body_footer"},"sections":[{"id":"buttons","type":"button_group","alignment":"horizontal","buttons":[{"label":"Start","style":"primary"},{"label":"Stop","style":"danger"},{"label":"Reset","style":"warning"}]},{"id":"indicators","type":"indicator_grid","rows":2,"columns":3},{"id":"alarm","type":"alarm_banner","position":"bottom","severity_levels":["warning","critical"]}]}
Create packaging machine dashboard. Steel gray theme. 4 machine cards. Resolution 1920x1080.

{"screen":{"type":"dashboard","resolution":{"width":1920,"height":1080},"theme":"steel_gray","layout":"dashboard_grid"},"sections":[{"id":"machines","type":"card_grid","rows":2,"columns":2,"card_template":{"title":"Machine","fields":["Status","Speed","Output"]}}]}
Change layout to sidebar layout and add navigation menu.

{"screen":{"type":"dashboard","resolution":{"width":1920,"height":1080},"theme":"steel_gray","layout":"sidebar_layout"},"sections":[{"id":"sidebar","type":"navigation_menu","items":["Overview","Alarms","Reports","Settings"]},{"id":"machines","type":"card_grid","rows":2,"columns":2,"card_template":{"title":"Machine","fields":["Status","Speed","Output"]}}]}
Create tank monitoring screen. Light theme. 3 tanks. Resolution 1366x768.

{"screen":{"type":"process_monitoring","resolution":{"width":1366,"height":768},"theme":"clean_light","layout":"single_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"tanks","type":"process_diagram","elements":3,"element_template":{"type":"vertical_tank","fields":["Level","Temperature"]}}]}
Add alarm banner and change theme to industrial dark.

{"screen":{"type":"process_monitoring","resolution":{"width":1366,"height":768},"theme":"industrial_dark","layout":"header_body_footer"},"sections":[{"id":"tanks","type":"process_diagram","elements":3,"element_template":{"type":"vertical_tank","fields":["Level","Temperature"]}},{"id":"alarm","type":"alarm_banner","position":"bottom","severity_levels":["warning","critical"]}]}
Create servo axis control screen. Midnight blue theme. Show position and speed values. Resolution 1280x720.

{"screen":{"type":"machine_control","resolution":{"width":1280,"height":720},"theme":"midnight_blue","layout":"single_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"position","type":"display_field","label":"Position"},{"id":"speed","type":"display_field","label":"Speed"}]}
Add Jog Forward and Jog Reverse buttons.

{"screen":{"type":"machine_control","resolution":{"width":1280,"height":720},"theme":"midnight_blue","layout":"single_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"position","type":"display_field","label":"Position"},{"id":"speed","type":"display_field","label":"Speed"},{"id":"jog_buttons","type":"button_group","alignment":"horizontal","buttons":[{"label":"Jog Forward","style":"secondary"},{"label":"Jog Reverse","style":"secondary"}]}]}
Create alarm summary page. High contrast theme. Resolution 1280x800.

{"screen":{"type":"alarm_summary","resolution":{"width":1280,"height":800},"theme":"high_contrast","layout":"single_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"alarm_table","type":"alarm_table","columns":["Time","Tag","Severity","Message"]}]}
Add severity pie chart and enable filtering.

{"screen":{"type":"alarm_summary","resolution":{"width":1280,"height":800},"theme":"high_contrast","layout":"split_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"alarm_table","type":"alarm_table","columns":["Time","Tag","Severity","Message"],"filter_enabled":true},{"id":"severity_chart","type":"chart","chart_type":"pie","data_source":"alarm_severity_distribution"}]}
Create boiler control screen. Dark theme. Show temperature and pressure gauges. Resolution 1280x720.

{"screen":{"type":"machine_control","resolution":{"width":1280,"height":720},"theme":"industrial_dark","layout":"single_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"temperature","type":"gauge","label":"Temperature"},{"id":"pressure","type":"gauge","label":"Pressure"}]}
Add Start and Stop buttons and alarm banner.

{"screen":{"type":"machine_control","resolution":{"width":1280,"height":720},"theme":"industrial_dark","layout":"header_body_footer"},"sections":[{"id":"gauges","type":"group","elements":[{"type":"gauge","label":"Temperature"},{"type":"gauge","label":"Pressure"}]},{"id":"buttons","type":"button_group","alignment":"horizontal","buttons":[{"label":"Start","style":"primary"},{"label":"Stop","style":"danger"}]},{"id":"alarm","type":"alarm_banner","position":"bottom","severity_levels":["warning","critical"]}]}
Create production overview dashboard. Clean light theme. Resolution 1920x1080.

{"screen":{"type":"dashboard","resolution":{"width":1920,"height":1080},"theme":"clean_light","layout":"dashboard_grid"},"sections":[{"id":"production_card","type":"card","title":"Production","fields":["Shift Output","Target","Efficiency"]}]}
Add machine status grid with 8 machines.

{"screen":{"type":"dashboard","resolution":{"width":1920,"height":1080},"theme":"clean_light","layout":"dashboard_grid"},"sections":[{"id":"production_card","type":"card","title":"Production","fields":["Shift Output","Target","Efficiency"]},{"id":"machines","type":"indicator_grid","rows":2,"columns":4,"indicator_style":"round_led"}]}
Create VFD control page. Steel gray theme. Frequency setpoint input. Resolution 1280x720.

{"screen":{"type":"machine_control","resolution":{"width":1280,"height":720},"theme":"steel_gray","layout":"single_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"frequency","type":"numeric_input","label":"Frequency Setpoint"}]}
Add Start, Stop and Run indicator.

{"screen":{"type":"machine_control","resolution":{"width":1280,"height":720},"theme":"steel_gray","layout":"single_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"frequency","type":"numeric_input","label":"Frequency Setpoint"},{"id":"buttons","type":"button_group","alignment":"horizontal","buttons":[{"label":"Start","style":"primary"},{"label":"Stop","style":"danger"}]},{"id":"run_indicator","type":"indicator_grid","rows":1,"columns":1}]}
Create micro HMI 800x480. Emergency Stop only. High contrast theme.

{"screen":{"type":"micro_hmi","resolution":{"width":800,"height":480},"theme":"high_contrast","layout":"single_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"emergency","type":"button_group","alignment":"vertical","buttons":[{"label":"Emergency Stop","style":"danger"}]}]}
Add system healthy indicator.

{"screen":{"type":"micro_hmi","resolution":{"width":800,"height":480},"theme":"high_contrast","layout":"single_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"emergency","type":"button_group","alignment":"vertical","buttons":[{"label":"Emergency Stop","style":"danger"}]},{"id":"health","type":"indicator_grid","rows":1,"columns":1}]}
Create assembly line monitoring screen. Dark theme. 10 indicators. Resolution 1366x768.

{"screen":{"type":"process_monitoring","resolution":{"width":1366,"height":768},"theme":"industrial_dark","layout":"single_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"line_status","type":"indicator_grid","rows":2,"columns":5,"indicator_style":"round_led"}]}
Convert to dashboard layout and add production chart.

{"screen":{"type":"dashboard","resolution":{"width":1366,"height":768},"theme":"industrial_dark","layout":"dashboard_grid"},"sections":[{"id":"line_status","type":"indicator_grid","rows":2,"columns":5,"indicator_style":"round_led"},{"id":"production_chart","type":"chart","chart_type":"line","data_source":"production_trend"}]}
Create pump monitoring screen. Dark theme. Show 4 pump status indicators. Resolution 1280x720.

{"screen":{"type":"process_monitoring","resolution":{"width":1280,"height":720},"theme":"industrial_dark","layout":"single_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"pump_status","type":"indicator_grid","rows":2,"columns":2,"indicator_style":"round_led"}]}
Convert this into a control screen with Start and Stop buttons for each pump.

{"screen":{"type":"machine_control","resolution":{"width":1280,"height":720},"theme":"industrial_dark","layout":"dashboard_grid"},"sections":[{"id":"pump_controls","type":"card_grid","rows":2,"columns":2,"card_template":{"title":"Pump","fields":["Status"],"controls":[{"label":"Start","style":"primary"},{"label":"Stop","style":"danger"}]}}]}
Create energy monitoring dashboard. Steel gray theme. Resolution 1920x1080.

{"screen":{"type":"energy_monitor","resolution":{"width":1920,"height":1080},"theme":"steel_gray","layout":"dashboard_grid"},"sections":[{"id":"energy_chart","type":"chart","chart_type":"line","data_source":"energy_trend"}]}
Convert this into executive overview style with summary cards instead of chart.

{"screen":{"type":"dashboard","resolution":{"width":1920,"height":1080},"theme":"steel_gray","layout":"dashboard_grid"},"sections":[{"id":"summary_cards","type":"card_grid","rows":1,"columns":4,"card_template":{"title":"Metric","fields":["Value","Trend"]}}]}
Create IO monitoring page. Light theme. 32 inputs. Resolution 1920x1080.

{"screen":{"type":"io_monitoring","resolution":{"width":1920,"height":1080},"theme":"clean_light","layout":"single_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"io_table","type":"io_table","digital_inputs":32,"digital_outputs":0}]}
Convert to micro HMI for 800x480 screen.

Create alarm summary page. High contrast theme. Resolution 1280x800.

{"screen":{"type":"alarm_summary","resolution":{"width":1280,"height":800},"theme":"high_contrast","layout":"single_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"alarm_table","type":"alarm_table","columns":["Time","Tag","Severity","Message"]}]}
Convert this into compact mobile style layout.

{"screen":{"type":"alarm_summary","resolution":{"width":800,"height":600},"theme":"high_contrast","layout":"single_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"alarm_list","type":"alarm_table","columns":["Tag","Severity"],"row_style":"compact"}]}
Create tank monitoring dashboard. Dark theme. 6 tanks. Resolution 1920x1080.

{"screen":{"type":"process_monitoring","resolution":{"width":1920,"height":1080},"theme":"industrial_dark","layout":"dashboard_grid"},"sections":[{"id":"tanks","type":"process_diagram","elements":6,"element_template":{"type":"vertical_tank","fields":["Level"]}}]}
Convert this into engineering-dense screen with more details.

{"screen":{"type":"process_monitoring","resolution":{"width":1920,"height":1080},"theme":"industrial_dark","layout":"split_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"tanks","type":"process_diagram","elements":6,"element_template":{"type":"vertical_tank","fields":["Level","Temperature","Pressure"]}},{"id":"numeric_table","type":"data_table","columns":["Tank","Level","Temp","Pressure"]}]}
Create motor control screen. Dark theme. Resolution 1280x720.

{"screen":{"type":"machine_control","resolution":{"width":1280,"height":720},"theme":"industrial_dark","layout":"single_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"motor_status","type":"indicator_grid","rows":1,"columns":1}]}
Convert this into dashboard with 8 motors.

{"screen":{"type":"dashboard","resolution":{"width":1280,"height":720},"theme":"industrial_dark","layout":"dashboard_grid"},"sections":[{"id":"motors","type":"indicator_grid","rows":2,"columns":4,"indicator_style":"round_led"}]}
Create production dashboard. Light theme. Resolution 1920x1080.

{"screen":{"type":"dashboard","resolution":{"width":1920,"height":1080},"theme":"clean_light","layout":"dashboard_grid"},"sections":[{"id":"production_chart","type":"chart","chart_type":"line","data_source":"production_trend"}]}

Create HVAC monitoring page. Resolution 1280x720.

{"screen":{"type":"process_monitoring","resolution":{"width":1280,"height":720},"theme":"steel_gray","layout":"single_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"hvac_status","type":"indicator_grid","rows":2,"columns":2}]}

{"screen":{"type":"machine_control","resolution":{"width":1280,"height":720},"theme":"high_contrast","layout":"single_panel"},"sections":[{"id":"status","type":"indicator_grid","rows":1,"columns":2}]}
Generate a pipeline SCADA screen with oil & gas theme. Show 200km pipeline with 5 pump stations, pressure profile, leak detection status, and product batch tracking. Resolution 1920x1080.

{"screen":{"type":"pipeline_scada","resolution":{"width":1920,"height":1080},"theme":"oil_gas","layout":"pipeline_profile"},"sections":[{"id":"pipeline_header","type":"title_bar","title":"Mainline Pipeline - Segment A","length":200,"length_unit":"km","diameter":36,"diameter_unit":"inches"},{"id":"pressure_profile","type":"profile_graph","stations":5,"station_names":["PS-1 Origin","PS-2 Midpoint","PS-3 Valley","PS-4 Hill","PS-5 Terminal"],"pressures":[1200,1150,1100,1050,950],"pressure_unit":"psi","elevations":[250,180,120,380,200]},{"id":"pump_stations","type":"station_array","stations":5,"station_status":["running","running","running","standby","running"],"pumps_running":[2,2,1,0,2],"flow_rates":[4500,4500,4500,0,4500],"flow_unit":"m³/hr"},{"id":"batch_tracking","type":"batch_display","batches":[{"product":"Light Crude","volume":25000,"location":"km 45"},{"product":"Diesel","volume":18000,"location":"km 82"},{"product":"Gasoline","volume":22000,"location":"km 128"}]},{"id":"leak_detection","type":"leak_monitor","system_status":"monitoring","mass_balance":99.98,"balance_unit":"%","threshold":0.5,"last_test":"2024-01-15 08:00"}]}
